Container.Name: Monitoror
Container.Overview:
DESCRIPTION Monitoror is a wallboard monitoring app to monitor server status; monitor CI builds progress or even display critical values.
Here you can see a live demo: https://demo.monitoror.com/
NOTES • Use the 'Directory (config)' path to store the 'config.json' file, so Monitoror can read it directly from the host. You can also use an URL (i.e.: NextCloud) to pass the JSON, using the 'MO_CONFIG' variable.
VERSION v1.0 (2021-12-04)

Config.Name: Directory (config)
Config.Description: Use this path (host) to pass the config.json to the container.

Config.Name: MO_CONFIG
Config.Description: It can be a path or URL.
